title: where can i find the website stream for the LCS play offs
body: i mean the LCS match of H2K vs GIANTS and the TIP vs  DIG

replies.body: You click E-sports at the top of the League page.

Just out of curiosity, where would you *expect* to find this stream?  In which places did you look originally?  The LeagueofLegends.com homepage, or somewhere else?

We're looking for better ways to help players discover content... so this info would be good feedback for us.  Thanks!
Youtube LoL esports channel, or http://www.twitch.tv/riotgames

the links for the streams are on [MakeThePlays.com](http://www.maketheplays.com/). as well as live play by plays for the matches. there are even Timestamps so that if you want to review important points in each match later on you can using those timestamps =)
